Rules

Your goal is to disable all mines and open all free cells/ Be carefull! If even one mine explode the hole game will end. To disable mines properly, pay attantion on numbers which every cell tells you. Number means how many mines are locate around. Good luck!

Controls

Hold control key if you want to set a flag on a cell and then click on the chosen cell.
